        public org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction createBtcTradingFeeTx(org.bitcoinj.core.Address fundingAddress,
                                                           org.bitcoinj.core.Address reservedForTradeAddress,
                                                           org.bitcoinj.core.Address changeAddress,
                                                           org.bitcoinj.core.Coin reservedFundsForOffer,
                                                           boolean useSavingsWallet,
                                                           org.bitcoinj.core.Coin tradingFee,
                                                           org.bitcoinj.core.Coin txFee,
                                                           java.lang.String feeReceiverAddresses,
                                                           com.google.common.util.concurrent.FutureCallback<org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction> callback)
                                                    throws org.bitcoinj.core.InsufficientMoneyException,
                                                           org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException
        Parameters:
        reservedForTradeAddress - From where we want to spend the transaction fee. Used also as change reservedForTradeAddress.
        useSavingsWallet -
        tradingFee - The amount of the trading fee.
        feeReceiverAddresses - The reservedForTradeAddress of the receiver of the trading fee (arbitrator). @return The broadcasted transaction
        Throws:
        org.bitcoinj.core.InsufficientMoneyException
        org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException

      • takerCreatesDepositsTxInputs

        public InputsAndChangeOutput takerCreatesDepositsTxInputs(org.bitcoinj.core.Coin inputAmount,
                                                          org.bitcoinj.core.Coin txFee,
                                                          org.bitcoinj.core.Address takersAddress,
                                                          org.bitcoinj.core.Address takersChangeAddress)
                                                   throws TransactionVerificationException,
                                                          WalletException
        The taker creates a dummy transaction to get the input(s) and optional change output for the amount and the takersAddress for that trade. That will be used to send to the maker for creating the deposit transaction.
        Parameters:
        inputAmount - Amount of takers input
        txFee - Mining fee
        takersAddress - Address of taker
        Returns:
        A data container holding the inputs, the output value and address
        Throws:
        TransactionVerificationException
        WalletException

      • makerCreatesAndSignsDepositTx

        public PreparedDepositTxAndMakerInputs makerCreatesAndSignsDepositTx(boolean makerIsBuyer,
                                                                     byte[] contractHash,
                                                                     org.bitcoinj.core.Coin makerInputAmount,
                                                                     org.bitcoinj.core.Coin msOutputAmount,
                                                                     java.util.List<RawTransactionInput> takerRawTransactionInputs,
                                                                     long takerChangeOutputValue,
                                                                     @Nullable
                                                                     java.lang.String takerChangeAddressString,
                                                                     org.bitcoinj.core.Address makerAddress,
                                                                     org.bitcoinj.core.Address makerChangeAddress,
                                                                     byte[] buyerPubKey,
                                                                     byte[] sellerPubKey,
                                                                     byte[] arbitratorPubKey)
                                                              throws SigningException,
                                                                     TransactionVerificationException,
                                                                     WalletException,
                                                                     org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException
        The maker creates the deposit transaction using the takers input(s) and optional output and signs his input(s).
        Parameters:
        makerIsBuyer - The flag indicating if we are in the maker as buyer role or the opposite.
        contractHash - The hash of the contract to be added to the OP_RETURN output.
        makerInputAmount - The input amount of the maker.
        msOutputAmount - The output amount to our MS output.
        takerRawTransactionInputs - Raw data for the connected outputs for all inputs of the taker (normally 1 input)
        takerChangeOutputValue - Optional taker change output value
        takerChangeAddressString - Optional taker change address
        makerAddress - The maker's address.
        makerChangeAddress - The maker's change address.
        buyerPubKey - The public key of the buyer.
        sellerPubKey - The public key of the seller.
        arbitratorPubKey - The public key of the arbitrator.
        Returns:
        A data container holding the serialized transaction and the maker raw inputs
        Throws:
        SigningException
        TransactionVerificationException
        WalletException
        org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException

      • takerSignsAndPublishesDepositTx

        public org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction takerSignsAndPublishesDepositTx(boolean takerIsSeller,
                                                                     byte[] contractHash,
                                                                     byte[] makersDepositTxSerialized,
                                                                     java.util.List<RawTransactionInput> buyerInputs,
                                                                     java.util.List<RawTransactionInput> sellerInputs,
                                                                     byte[] buyerPubKey,
                                                                     byte[] sellerPubKey,
                                                                     byte[] arbitratorPubKey,
                                                                     com.google.common.util.concurrent.FutureCallback<org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction> callback)
                                                              throws SigningException,
                                                                     TransactionVerificationException,
                                                                     WalletException
        The taker signs the deposit transaction he received from the maker and publishes it.
        Parameters:
        takerIsSeller - The flag indicating if we are in the taker as seller role or the opposite.
        contractHash - The hash of the contract to be added to the OP_RETURN output.
        makersDepositTxSerialized - The prepared deposit transaction signed by the maker.
        buyerInputs - The connected outputs for all inputs of the buyer.
        sellerInputs - The connected outputs for all inputs of the seller.
        buyerPubKey - The public key of the buyer.
        sellerPubKey - The public key of the seller.
        arbitratorPubKey - The public key of the arbitrator.
        callback - Callback when transaction is broadcasted.
        Throws:
        SigningException
        TransactionVerificationException
        WalletException

      • buyerSignsPayoutTx

        public byte[] buyerSignsPayoutTx(org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction depositTx,
                                 org.bitcoinj.core.Coin buyerPayoutAmount,
                                 org.bitcoinj.core.Coin sellerPayoutAmount,
                                 java.lang.String buyerPayoutAddressString,
                                 java.lang.String sellerPayoutAddressString,
                                 org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey multiSigKeyPair,
                                 byte[] buyerPubKey,
                                 byte[] sellerPubKey,
                                 byte[] arbitratorPubKey)
                          throws org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException,
                                 TransactionVerificationException
        Seller signs payout transaction, buyer has not signed yet.
        Parameters:
        depositTx - Deposit transaction
        buyerPayoutAmount - Payout amount for buyer
        sellerPayoutAmount - Payout amount for seller
        buyerPayoutAddressString - Address for buyer
        sellerPayoutAddressString - Address for seller
        multiSigKeyPair - DeterministicKey for MultiSig from seller
        buyerPubKey - The public key of the buyer.
        sellerPubKey - The public key of the seller.
        arbitratorPubKey - The public key of the arbitrator.
        Returns:
        DER encoded canonical signature
        Throws:
        org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException
        TransactionVerificationException

      • sellerSignsAndFinalizesPayoutTx

        public org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction sellerSignsAndFinalizesPayoutTx(org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction depositTx,
                                                                     byte[] buyerSignature,
                                                                     org.bitcoinj.core.Coin buyerPayoutAmount,
                                                                     org.bitcoinj.core.Coin sellerPayoutAmount,
                                                                     java.lang.String buyerPayoutAddressString,
                                                                     java.lang.String sellerPayoutAddressString,
                                                                     org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey multiSigKeyPair,
                                                                     byte[] buyerPubKey,
                                                                     byte[] sellerPubKey,
                                                                     byte[] arbitratorPubKey)
                                                              throws org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException,
                                                                     TransactionVerificationException,
                                                                     WalletException
        Buyer creates and signs payout transaction and adds signature of seller to complete the transaction
        Parameters:
        depositTx - Deposit transaction
        buyerSignature - DER encoded canonical signature of seller
        buyerPayoutAmount - Payout amount for buyer
        sellerPayoutAmount - Payout amount for seller
        buyerPayoutAddressString - Address for buyer
        sellerPayoutAddressString - Address for seller
        multiSigKeyPair - Buyer's keypair for MultiSig
        buyerPubKey - The public key of the buyer.
        sellerPubKey - The public key of the seller.
        arbitratorPubKey - The public key of the arbitrator.
        Returns:
        The payout transaction
        Throws:
        org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException
        TransactionVerificationException
        WalletException

      • arbitratorSignsDisputedPayoutTx

        public byte[] arbitratorSignsDisputedPayoutTx(byte[] depositTxSerialized,
                                              org.bitcoinj.core.Coin buyerPayoutAmount,
                                              org.bitcoinj.core.Coin sellerPayoutAmount,
                                              java.lang.String buyerAddressString,
                                              java.lang.String sellerAddressString,
                                              org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey arbitratorKeyPair,
                                              byte[] buyerPubKey,
                                              byte[] sellerPubKey,
                                              byte[] arbitratorPubKey)
                                       throws org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException,
                                              TransactionVerificationException
        That arbitrator signs the payout transaction
        Parameters:
        depositTxSerialized - Serialized deposit tx
        buyerPayoutAmount - The payout amount of the buyer.
        sellerPayoutAmount - The payout amount of the seller.
        buyerAddressString - The address of the buyer.
        sellerAddressString - The address of the seller.
        arbitratorKeyPair - The keypair of the arbitrator.
        buyerPubKey - The public key of the buyer.
        sellerPubKey - The public key of the seller.
        arbitratorPubKey - The public key of the arbitrator.
        Returns:
        DER encoded canonical signature of arbitrator
        Throws:
        org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException
        TransactionVerificationException

      • traderSignAndFinalizeDisputedPayoutTx

        public org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction traderSignAndFinalizeDisputedPayoutTx(byte[] depositTxSerialized,
                                                                           byte[] arbitratorSignature,
                                                                           org.bitcoinj.core.Coin buyerPayoutAmount,
                                                                           org.bitcoinj.core.Coin sellerPayoutAmount,
                                                                           java.lang.String buyerAddressString,
                                                                           java.lang.String sellerAddressString,
                                                                           org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey tradersMultiSigKeyPair,
                                                                           byte[] buyerPubKey,
                                                                           byte[] sellerPubKey,
                                                                           byte[] arbitratorPubKey)
                                                                    throws org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException,
                                                                           TransactionVerificationException,
                                                                           WalletException
        A trader who got the signed tx from the arbitrator finalizes the payout tx
        Parameters:
        depositTxSerialized - Serialized deposit tx
        arbitratorSignature - DER encoded canonical signature of arbitrator
        buyerPayoutAmount - Payout amount of the buyer
        sellerPayoutAmount - Payout amount of the seller
        buyerAddressString - The address of the buyer.
        sellerAddressString - The address of the seller.
        tradersMultiSigKeyPair - The keypair for the MultiSig of the trader who calls that method
        buyerPubKey - The public key of the buyer.
        sellerPubKey - The public key of the seller.
        arbitratorPubKey - The public key of the arbitrator.
        Returns:
        The completed payout tx
        Throws:
        org.bitcoinj.core.AddressFormatException
        TransactionVerificationException
        WalletException

        public org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction addTxToWallet(org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction transaction)
                                            throws org.bitcoinj.core.VerificationException
        Parameters:
        transaction - The transaction to be added to the wallet
        Returns:
        The transaction we added to the wallet, which is different as the one we passed as argument!

        org.bitcoinj.core.VerificationException
